title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
descr: Build or repair equipment such as furnaces, kilns, cupolas, boilers, converters, ladles, soaking pits, and ovens, using refractory materials.
alt_titles: Bondactor Machine Operator, Cell Reliner, Clay Structure Builder, Clay Structure Servicer, Concrete Caulking Technician, Cupola Repairer, Furnace Repairer, Hot Repairman, Kiln Door Builder, Kiln Door Repairer, Ladle Liner, Ladle Repairer, Ladle Repairman, Oven Equipment Repairer, Plastic Block Boiler Reliner, Refractory Bricklayer, Refractory Furnace Designer, Refractory Materials Repairer, Refractory Repairer, Refractory Technician, Refractory Worker, Stopper, Stopper Maker
experience: Some previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is usually needed. For example, a teller would benefit from experience working directly with the public.
education: These occupations usually require a high school diploma.
job_training: Employees in these occupations need anywhere from a few months to one year of working with experienced employees. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations often involve using your knowledge and skills to help others. Examples include orderlies, counter and rental clerks, customer service representatives, security guards, upholsterers, tellers, and dental laboratory technicians.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Chip slag from linings of ladles or remove linings when beyond repair, using hammers and chisels.
work_tasks.descr: Chip slag from linings of ladles or remove linings when beyond repair, using hammers and chisels.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Mix specified amounts of sand, clay, mortar powder, and water to form refractory clay or mortar, using shovels or mixing machines.
work_tasks.descr: Mix specified amounts of sand, clay, mortar powder, and water to form refractory clay or mortar, using shovels or mixing machines.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Measure furnace walls to determine dimensions and cut required number of sheets from plastic block, using saws.
work_tasks.descr: Measure furnace walls to determine dimensions and cut required number of sheets from plastic block, using saws.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Reline or repair ladles and pouring spouts with refractory clay, using trowels.
work_tasks.descr: Reline or repair ladles and pouring spouts with refractory clay, using trowels.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Tighten locknuts holding refractory stopper assemblies together, spread mortar on jackets to seal sleeve joints, and dry mortar in ovens.
work_tasks.descr: Tighten locknuts holding refractory stopper assemblies together, spread mortar on jackets to seal sleeve joints, and dry mortar in ovens.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Dry and bake new linings by placing inverted linings over burners, building fires in ladles, or by using blowtorches.
work_tasks.descr: Dry and bake new linings by placing inverted linings over burners, building fires in ladles, or by using blowtorches.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Spread mortar on stopper heads and rods, using trowels, and slide brick sleeves over rods to form refractory jackets.
work_tasks.descr: Spread mortar on stopper heads and rods, using trowels, and slide brick sleeves over rods to form refractory jackets.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Remove worn or damaged plastic block refractory linings of furnaces, using hand tools.
work_tasks.descr: Remove worn or damaged plastic block refractory linings of furnaces, using hand tools.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Fasten stopper heads to rods with metal pins to assemble refractory stoppers used to plug pouring nozzles of steel ladles.
work_tasks.descr: Fasten stopper heads to rods with metal pins to assemble refractory stoppers used to plug pouring nozzles of steel ladles.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Climb scaffolding, carrying hoses, and spray surfaces of cupolas with refractory mixtures, using spray equipment.
work_tasks.descr: Climb scaffolding, carrying hoses, and spray surfaces of cupolas with refractory mixtures, using spray equipment.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Drill holes in furnace walls, bolt overlapping layers of plastic to walls, and hammer surfaces to compress layers into solid sheets.
work_tasks.descr: Drill holes in furnace walls, bolt overlapping layers of plastic to walls, and hammer surfaces to compress layers into solid sheets.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Install preformed metal scaffolding in interiors of cupolas, using hand tools.
work_tasks.descr: Install preformed metal scaffolding in interiors of cupolas, using hand tools.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Dump and tamp clay in molds, using tamping tools.
work_tasks.descr: Dump and tamp clay in molds, using tamping tools.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Install clay structures in melting tanks and drawing kilns to control the flow and temperature of molten glass, using hoists and hand tools.
work_tasks.descr: Install clay structures in melting tanks and drawing kilns to control the flow and temperature of molten glass, using hoists and hand tools.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Disassemble molds, and cut, chip, and smooth clay structures such as floaters, drawbars, and L-blocks.
work_tasks.descr: Disassemble molds, and cut, chip, and smooth clay structures such as floaters, drawbars, and L-blocks.

work_tasks.title: Refractory Materials Repairers, Except Brickmasons
work_tasks.task: Transfer clay structures to curing ovens, melting tanks, and drawing kilns, using forklifts.
work_tasks.descr: Transfer clay structures to curing ovens, melting tanks, and drawing kilns, using forklifts.
